description:
Sentry has launched the Open Source Pledge—a programme designed to provide direct financial support to open-source software maintainers. The initiative stems from a long-standing aspiration to give back to the open-source community on behalf of every Sentry employee. The concept of the Open Source Pledge emerged years ago with two primary objectives: to compensate maintainers... Read more »

The post Open Source Pledge aims to fund software maintainers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Open Source Pledge aims to fund software maintainers
